example.name: no source
example.text: The eyeteeth (third from the middle on top, counting each fronttooth as the first) beginning [*] to protrude like fangs.
example.arg: The eyeteeth (third from the middle on top, counting each front tooth as the first)

example.name: with source
example.text: Johnson's fat hand, another bottle were protruding from the truck cab, and that self-proclaimed Baptist teetotaler, had a bottle at his own lips.

example.name: adjectival
example.text: One main type of malocclusion is characterized by a receding chinand protruding upper front teeth.
